articles.title: 37-year-old switched careers and became a vegan dietitian to help save her life—'My own health was suffering' - CNBC
articles.description: To combat her own health issues, Catherine Perez switched careers and became a vegan dietitian. Now, she lives a healthier lifestyle and makes $125,000 a year.
articles.content:
In her early 20s, Catherine Perez was faced with developing health issues and decided to take the reins in her own life by shifting her lifestyle.
